Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Ill-mannered \Ill`-man"nered\, a. Impolite; rude; displaying socially incorrect behavior.
Syn: rude, unmannered, unmannerly. [1913 Webster]
ill-mannered adj : socially incorrect in behavior; "resentment flared at such an unmannered intrusion" [syn: {rude}, {unmannered}, {unmannerly}]
